channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The next Social Security COLA increase won’t be enough to solve this crisis.
item.description: Millions of older adults already can’t afford housing, food or healthcare.

item.title: Economy ranks as No. 1 issue for Republican voters, but it’s not in Democrats’ top 5, poll finds
item.description: Ahead of next month’s election, a new Gallup poll has found no overlap at all between Republican and Democratic voters in their top five issues.

item.title: Prime rethinks enterprise security by design with AI system risk analysis and suggested actions
item.description: Prime’s primary differentiator, according to Nov, is its ability to provide not only risk identification but also actionable recommendations.

item.title: Viking Therapeutics’ stock boosted by positive data from trial of treatment for rare metabolic disorder X-ALD
item.description: Viking, which is also developing a weight-loss pill, has a buy rating from all 13 analysts offering coverage.
